Watercolor at the Garden with Carl Stoveland
$20 for members; $25 for nonmembers (includes full Garden admission)Registration is required; class size is limited to 15 adults; classes are nonrefundable.  Join artist Carl Stoveland and share your love of art and nature with fellow art enthusiasts! Palm Beach County Residents Days
September 3 @ 9:00 am
-
4:00 pm
Palm Beach County Residents Days
FREE admission for Palm Beach County residents on the first Wednesday of every month. Visitors must show proof of residency for entry. Admission for non-residents: $20 for adults; $18 for seniors, college students, and military with ID; $13 for ages 6-17; free for children under age 6.

September 5 @ 2:00 pm
-
3:00 pm
Sahaja Yoga Meditation
Free with Admission to the Garden. Registration is required. Sahaja Yoga meditation is a simple technique that is very effective in helping us to achieve a state of satisfaction, joy, balance, and peace. It is easily practiced by anyone, regardless of age or background. The class will include simple instruction, guided meditation and practical information on how to […]

Hatha & Nidra Yoga: Movement & Deep Rest
$18.75 for members; $25 for nonmembers (includes full Garden admission)Registration is required; class size is limited to 15 adults; classes are non-refundable.  This special all-levels class blends invigorating Hatha yoga with the deep restoration of Yoga Nidra. Begin with gentle movement to build strength, balance, and breath awareness, then transition into a guided Yoga Nidra practice […]

Walking Meditation
$18.75 for members; $25 for nonmembers (includes full Garden admission)Registration is required; class size is limited to 15 adults; classes are non-refundable.  Join us for a gentle, all-levels walking meditation through the serene paths of Mounts Botanical Garden. September 14 @ 9:00 am
-
4:00 pm
Dogs’ Day in the Garden
Bring your dog for a Garden stroll! Second Sunday of each month (except during events and plant sales) Regular Garden Hours: June-October: 9 am – 3 pm (last entry at 2 pm)November-May: 9 am – 4 pm (last entry at 3 pm) Admission: Regular garden admission applies for humans. Dogs are free for members and $5 for […]

Why Become a Mounts Botanical Member?
FREE
admission to Garden, Plant Sales & Exhibits
FREE digital subscription to MBG
Leaflet
&
Better Homes & Garden
magazine
FREE admission to 380+ gardens nationwide
FREE admission for 1 dog/adult on Dogs’ Days
10% discount at Gift Shop, Nursery & Vintage Thrift Shop
Discounts on classes and workshops
Advance notice of upcoming events
Your membership directly supports horticulture programs, education, art and culture, and garden beautification.
Membership Options:
Avid Gardener – $60
Garden Family – $95
Garden Steward – $150
Garden Lover – $250
Garden Patron – $500
Gardening Angel – $1,000
Join for 2 Years and Save 10%
Membership Benefits
For assistance:
Rachel Lucas | Membership Programs Manager| 561-233-1755 |
rlucas@pbcgov.org
AHS Reciprocal Garden Network
The Friends of The Mounts Botanical Garden, Inc. is a 501 (c)(3) registered non-profit organization. Contributions are tax deductible to the extent permitted by law. A copy of the official registration (Registration #CH9858) and financial information may be obtained from the Division of Consumer Services by calling toll-free, 1-800-435-7352 within the State of Florida, or online at https://www.freshfromflorida.com/Divisions-Offices/Consumer-Services. Registration does not imply endorsement, approval, or recommendation by the State. All donations received are used to support the mission of the Friends of The Mounts Botanical Garden.

Make Memories with Mounts Botanical Garden
We offer multiple unique locations to choose from. The lush tropical foliage, flowering trees and Lake Orth ensure a romantic, all-natural backdrop for ceremonies, celebrations and post-event photographs.
November through June are particularly desirable, as more of the flowering plants are in glorious bloom during these months.
Choose Your Space
Gazebo Garden
– This intimate garden includes a charming gazebo and center walkway flanked by two seating areas with floral borders. Capacity is 100. (This is the only garden area with electricity.)
Great Lawn
– Our largest, open space fronts Lake Orth and includes walkways, beautiful trees and palms, as well as our current Stickwork installation. Capacity is 100.
Rainbow Garden
– Located near the bridge to the shade island, colorful shrubs, trees and annuals border an open lawn area. Capacity is 100.
Venue Rentals Overview
Mounts Botanical offers daytime rentals only; Tuesday through Sunday.
Ceremonies and special events may be scheduled as early as 9:00 a.m. and must be completed by 2:00 p.m. Please keep in mind that the Garden is open to the public from 9am – 3pm.
Unfortunately, we do not have an additional rental space for receptions.
The Venue Rental Fee is $2,500 for MBG Members at the Garden Steward level and above, and $3,500 for nonmembers. An additional $400 security deposit is due at time of reservation. The security deposit will be refunded as stated in the rental contract.
The fee includes chairs and four hours of time to allow for decorating, set-up, tear down and photos.
We are not able to accommodate weddings or other events on Palm Beach County holidays.
Arrange a Site Tour
We invite you to visit and tour the Garden! To schedule an appointment, please email mountsweddings@pbcgov.org.
Appointments are available Monday – Friday, 8am – 3pm.
